ED_Title: Open-ended Working Group on Developments  in the Field of Information and Telecommunications in the Context of International Security established pursuant to General Assembly resolution 73/27 of 5 December 2018
ED_DecisionText: At its 48th (resumed) plenary meeting, on 31 December 2020, the General Assembly, on the recommendation of the First Committee (A/75/394, para. 18),  recalling its resolutions 73/27 of 5 December 2018 and 74/29 of 12 December 2019, noting that the Open-ended Working Group on Developments in the Field of Information and Telecommunications in the Context of International Security had held its organizational and first and second substantive sessions in 2019 and 2020, and noting also that, owing to the coronavirus disease (COVID 19) pandemic, the third and final substantive session, scheduled for 6 to 10 July 2020, had been cancelled, decided that the Open-ended Working Group, while continuing its current work pursuant to its mandate under resolution 73/27, shall convene its third and final substantive session from 8 to 12 March 2021.
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/75/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
